snippet: Durant had bone graft surgery for a fracture in his right foot. The Oklahoma City Thunder said Durant was expected to return to basketball activities in four to six months.
abstract: Oklahoma City Thunder star Kevin Durant undergoes successful bone graft surgery in New York City for fracture in his right foot.
lead_paragraph: Durant had bone graft surgery for a fracture in his right foot. The Oklahoma City Thunder said Durant was expected to return to basketball activities in four to six months.

headline.main: Thunder’s Kevin Durant Has Foot Surgery
